name: Battle Arena Toshinden 2
description:
Authentic arcade action comes to your PC with Battle Arena Toshinden 2! Let the tournament begin! You can gouge with your gamepad, kick with your keyboard and joust with your joystick as this hit arcade fighter explodes onto your PC!
Enter the ultimate underworld martial arts tournament where weapons are allowed and real power is the ultimate prize. Are you wild enough to whip Sofia? Are you mad enough to match skills with Mondo? Do you dare to dodge the swords of Duke? Now is your chance... your invitation has arrived!
